summary: An ENB to use with Terrible Textures for Weak Computer.
descriptionHtml:
Use this ENB after you have downloaded [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22777/?]Terrible Textures for Weak Computers by gutlessVADER[/url] or are using any other textures that turn Skyrim into a cartoon. This ENB will remove all that glossiness and shiny look that makes everything look like plastic when there are no textures.

And here's a simple tutorial for playing Toon Skyrim:
[b]Step 1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/22777/?]Download Terrible Textures for Weak Computers by gutlessVADER[/url][/b]
[b]Step 2. [/b]Download this ENB[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78887/?]
[/url][b]Step 3. [/b]Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/78928?]these textures[/url] that replace some ugly ones
[b]Step 4. (Optional) [/b]Use a mod to disable blood, I suggest [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36/?]No blood by Citizen86[/url].

Why no blood? Because in my opinion it doesn't fit with the cartoon-feel, but that's just my opinion.

And that's it! Remember when you saw that thing on Reddit and you were like "Aw, man. Am I ever gonna be able to play it?" Well you were just lazy, because I literally typed into Google "nexus toon skyrim," did a little bit of digging, found the Terrible Textures, and boom! Well anyway, I hope you enjoy.
author: EpkSceOnTcos
